name: Chopper Attack (itch)
description: Chopper Attack is a simple arcade game where you shoot down helicopters with a turret (similar to the old game of "Sabotage" on the Apple II).  Try to get as many as you can before too many of them land on the ground.  Features a clean, easy-to-use user interface, customizable options, sound effects, musical soundtracks, and high score tracking.
